content.label: It’s just makes you wanna stop and never use it again!!!
Please do not download this ap it is a completely scam and will take your money right of your account PLEASE STAY SAFE ANS DONT DOWNLOAD THE APPPP
I just downloaded the app & at least 6 people have texted me. all 6 barely joined in november & have no listings no followers & no location. they just ask if my item is available & then don't respond

title.label: I used to love this app

content.label: But now it’s like pulling teeth to get any attention on my items and they are good items! It’s like that since last update, not sure what happened please fix for a re-rating!

title.label: Expected better but I’m still hopeful.

content.label:
What excited me about this app was the feature to earn 5 Miles GC or Amazon GC by earning points while using the app & referring friends. A few of my FB friends signed up & I never received points for them. 3,000 points are pending all because it shows that they need to verify their phone number. That’s not cool at all. They signed up, gave their information & all that it prompts you to do when you join so why does it have to make things complicated by having you go back into the profile information section & update to verify your phone number again just so that the person who invited you can receive their reward too??! That doesn’t even make any sense. I’d like my 3,000 points please & you’ll have a long time customer out of me but if not I’ll be dropping my 2 star rating down to a 1. I’m giving 2 stars now simply because why should I give any more that that when I myself can’t even claim my rewards for inviting friends as promised. I’ve waited a few weeks before sharing this due to the fact that I hoped it would eventually go from pending to approved. I really do love the concept here so I’m hoping this one issue will be sorted out & I can continue telling my friends & family to check out this app that looks like a really awesome concept; just needs to tweak this one thing. I will update my review if this is resolved ASAP. Thank you in advance 5 Miles. Hope to hear back from you soon!

Oh yea: The newest features with the surveys & what not, those never work. I’ve tried them from each category & each attempt has been flawed in some way. Maybe that is something else that needs some attention as well. But for now PLEAASE do something about the referral program because the phone number verification part sometimes fails but the app doesn’t even notify you that your phone number verification failed. That part honestly needs to be done away with. If developers can’t make it to where the phone number verification takes place when you begin the enrollment process of joining the app like most other apps I have ever used do, then just don’t even do it at all. Whose going to think that they need to go back into their user profile at some point later on to go through a verification process when they have already gotten themselves set up with the app?? Like I said, the way it’s set up doesn’t make any sense at all. I do appreciate the effort though. I know these things aren’t so easy to do. I have confidence that things will improve.😃👍

title.label: I order a lot of stuff on a 5 mile

content.label: I have not received one of my package man and it’s not fear so you paying for stuff that you’re not receiving you call the post office to get him the tracking number they don’t match your call FedEx it tracking number don’t match your call UPS the tracking number don’t match I want my money back or else I’m off to get a lawyer because it’s not fear Yala scam artist

I’ve tried to search for things but Everytime I click on the search bar it does nothing so I’m not able to search anything and I’ve deleted the app and re downloaded it 3 times and that didn’t help
And why did you guys also change the search bar from being across the top to the right corner?

I tried working out a mistake that I received the dress as received it by mistake.  The incompetence of the people who work in 5 miles is deplorable and incomprehensible!!!
Now I’m out of $21 for a dress I NEVER received.

I’ve had this app for years and have sold tons of items, made my way to the top, had excellent reviews and now my whole profile is completely wiped out.  I see that this has happened to others. It’s a shame.  I’m not starting over again.  It would be nice if they could retrieve and fix client accounts. Oh well!!!
had GROWN men commenting on my posts about how i was attractive and how they wanted to meet. I was 15 just trying to make quick cash. Disturbing and disgusting.

Everything about this app looks fake, if you get a message you can tell it’s fake because the "person" sends you two messages and never responds, and the fact that your supposed to find people within five miles of you is fake as well, "people" have messaged me from all the way in Tennessee when I live. In Madison
I love having the opportunity to sell my things at a reasonable price within just a few miles away
Unbelievable, all 3 buyers that messaged me, wanted me to click on a link to send them a code so they know I am not a scammer. Ugh deleting this

Why do you keep sending me stupid notifications and putting badges on my app and when I open it I have no idea why. Leave me the crap alone! God this is really the worst app of this type I’ve ever used.
Horrible scam , products are crap, customer support is non available, deleting app

I rarely take time to write reviews but this app is special. It promotes fake auctions with fake  automatically generated winners and exaggerate prices of the auctioned item, for example a Chinese-brand drone worth $20 on AliExpress listed as $399 to trick people into thinking they’re getting some sort of deal. I confirmed they were fake because every time I leave the app for a second, the bid timer resets. This is an absolutely disgusting business practice and should be illegal.

I've only had one buyer that lives in my state to get a total of 4 items off of me. Every message I get is some one in ny or out west I don't ship so it's not easy for me to get local buyers on here and the out of state buyers always ask me to txt them while the buyer in my state didn't do that.

I had this app for 24 hours thinking it was another LetGo/OfferUp, it’s not. Within those 24 hours, two people tried to scam me. I then started looking at reviews and many people hve this problem. They don’t have good security, there are a lot of fake items, and they won’t credit you back any money if you lost it to a scam (I saw that someone is actually suing them because of this). This is ridiculous.

This app has potential to be good but as far as safety measures, they have none. I reported a man by the user name of Titilokster Pacheco two weeks ago for being inappropriate by offering to buy one of my items with drugs instead of money. He then offered to buy my item for a lower asking price which I said “no” to and responded with “ok I’ll give you 20..n u give me a kiss then 😘” with a followed up of his phone number with eggplant emojis. Might want to improve on that considering the age for this app is 12+. Oh by the way, this man still has an active 5 mile account. Absolutely NOTHING has been done.
This app is good for selling but there are a lot of fake accounts which message you just leave you on read and never buy anything in my experience, which Is why I got frustrated and deleted the app

I have the notifications on for this app but for some reason, it gives me notifications about their stories that they have on the app. I guess they also try to function through articles and ads that way? Nonetheless I probably get three notifications an hour from them about these clickbait articles.
And I can’t mark sold I have to delete the item then I get stuck with not selling a item or so it says.. this is stupid

They need to do a better job at fraud control.
Every single person that I’ve encountered on this app was fake. Useless.
It great, you can find all kinds of different things
I’ve gotten 1 view in 2 days on 5 items. Very disappointing.

I have this member who wrote a false review, which I’ve never sold or bought anything from this person. And have yet to hear anything from their support staff, I don’t believe a person should be able to leave a review without me buying or selling an item to them or at least should be able to write a review back but for some odd reason this person was able to write a review on me but I wasn’t allowed to write one on them plus I had blocked them so they should’ve never been able to get onto my profile. Major bugs need to be fixed

Now I’ve been dealing with harassment from the same user for an hour. And yet to hear anything for support and hopefully they ban this user but from the looks of it probably not
Sends countless notifications through all hours of the day and it’s really annoying. It never explained how to use the app well either so it is confusing

title.label: Got my money and don’t even let me post!

content.label: It requires money to post. I paid but still can’t post. Wasted my $1.

This has to be the worst buy/selling app I have ever seen. It creates FAKE bots that will ask what you are selling then never text you back to make it seem like real people are interested in what you have to sell. The entire concept of this app is terrible and needs to get taken down from the app store.

I posted items and never got any response, turns out you have to buy coins or some crap . Because ppl tried messaging me and the messages don’t go thru. Can’t even deactivate my account . So I just deleted the app . Now I’m getting spam emails . I’m gonna report this scam app .

Notifications don’t always work, coupons are forced, and this bidding system that they have is just an annoyiñance. Now they have decided to start using forced video ads when your doing actions in the app such as opening messages and such. I haven’t deleted the app because my profile is well established with lots of sales but thinking of deleting because of these annoying video ads.
I

Most accounts seem like spam accounts. No pictures so you never know who you talking to on the other end. People message me and say they interested and ask to meet but they stop responding. This app is wasting my time.

Sometimes it will say I have 1 message and it s advertising I don’t like that to much. I can’t hear when the people are try na buy my stuff. That’s a bad thing. But other than that it’s pretty good. Has a lot of good items on here and for great prices.
Hate the ads

title.label: Not bad. VERY BUGGY. NEEDS UPDATED.

content.label: This isn’t a terrible app, but the way it is set up is bad. Buttons won’t work after a few minutes, crashes almost every 10 minutes, and I get false notifications saying I have a message, but when I open the app, I have no messages. This app NEEDS work and updates. Besides that, it’s just another selling app that can work sometimes.
I was on this app or you’re so go it’s completely changed now it’s mostly commercial. Not user friendly For individuals. Won’t use it again
Flooded with scammer “buyers”, and the Dash deals are full of counterfeit goods. Used to be a good app

I literally got this app yesterday trying to sell my bed set and my first message I got was someone asking if I had cash app so that I can sell them pictures! I’m a very YOUNG adult and this app could’ve caused me to meet up with some sex offenders. I am so grossed out by this app and support team. The whole app should be taken down completely.
I use this app and won’t give my location just from other states even after my zip code and location

No user traffic whatsoever, which is the idea of this app, to sell things. Doesn’t explain clearly what the points you gain are used for, and send annoying notifications every day about social media related stuff that I don’t care about. To top it off, they don’t allow you to delete your account, only deactivate it, “in case you want to reactivate later on”. This is unethical. DELETE MY ACCOUNT. If I wanted to use your app later on, I can create a new account. Just plain awful.
trying to list items to sell and won’t publish without a title but won’t let you list a title. useless

I had this app for 2 years it went from respected marketplace to cheap wish app looking app with ads and cheap products from china 
Dont use this app instead use OfferUp they dont have ads and fake users
It literally has bits message you asking questions EVERY day, so you think people are interested.It’s a waste of time, and storage space. Would not recommend.

title.label: Videos and body shame has to go.

content.label: I will no longer be using this app. Frequently, I get notifications from the app about videos that were posted, I’m assuming this is a commercial, but typically the videos comments that 5 miles share are some kind of body shaming, or inappropriate comments that appear as notifications from 5miles. It is absolutely unacceptable for an application that supposed to be selling things locally to be posting body shaming comments. The world needs kindness, not this crap. Do better. If I could give this no stars, I would.
Inappropriate ads popped up while using, so not recommend
I do not recommend this app.
Great service
All of a sudden the app crashes every time I view a product, makes app unusable. Other than that, it’s a great app.

title.label: Lousy non responsive fake buyers and auto pop up ads
